meanings: Pronoun (Abbr.) 거2. this, that (→저거, 그것, 이거)

vlive.korean: 그럼 그걸로 할래? Then, do you want to try that? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: Then, do you want to try that?

vlive.korean: 바꿨습니다 그걸로 바꿨습니다 - 이걸로 바꾸기로 했잖아 - 어디 어디? We changed it to this. - To this. - Which part? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: We changed it to this. - To this. - Which part?

vlive.korean: 그럼 그걸로 하는 걸로 어때요? May I pick this one? 듣기 View video OUI ENTERTAINMENT : [#YO_LIVE]요한이를 바라봄🌼
그걸로 이제 허리랑... 우리 의상 맞추는 거랑 똑같아 - 그래? And then they do the waist. It's just like our costumes. - Is it? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 22 🦊🐿(다시)
vlive.english: And then they do the waist. It's just like our costumes. - Is it?

vlive.korean: 그다음에 그걸로 푸! Then, blow it! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.20 논리나잇 #2 (Debate Night #2)

examples.korean: That just about wraps it up for today. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그걸로 오늘 회의[논의]는 거의 마무리되는 것 같군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That just about wraps it up for today. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sarah wanted the kitchen painted green, and what she says, goes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사라가 부엌을 녹색으로 칠하고 싶어 했어. 그녀가 말했다 하면 그걸로 끝이니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sarah wanted the kitchen painted green, and what she says, goes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I’ll pay your airfare.’ ‘Okay, that clinches it—I’ll come with you.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “내가 당신 비행기 표 값을 지불하겠어요.” “좋아요, 그걸로 매듭짓죠. 당신과 함께 가겠어요.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I’ll pay your airfare.’ ‘Okay, that clinches it—I’ll come with you.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you like it, then I say let's go with it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그게 좋으면, 그걸로 하죠. DARAKWON
examples.english: If you like it, then I say let's go with it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wow! That must have cost you a fortune. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 와우! 그걸로 수억 깨졌겠는데. DARAKWON
examples.english: Wow! That must have cost you a fortune. Add to Wordbook
